General.Name: Lokman Hekim Engurusag Saglik Turizm Egitim Hizmetleri ve Insaat Taahhut AS
General.Description: Lokman Hekim Engürüsag Saglik, Turizm, Egitim Hizmetleri ve Insaat Taahhüt A.S. owns and operates hospitals in Turkey. The company offers various medical and diagnostic services. It operates hospitals, a medical center, and a diagnostic center. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.
General.Address: Kentpark Ofis Dumlupnar Bulvar, Ankara, Turkey

3.Name: Mr. Ömer  Eker
3.Title: Director of Financial Affairs & Director of Investor Relations
